name: Add new Encharge people to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time a new person has been added to Encharge, Make will automatically add a new row to a specified Google Sheets spreadsheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1p3MrBOGK6kW3EavnQtgjEw9QKZB00qBzrJX7RUVOFrU/edit?usp=sharing).
